data.title: Netizen LOL
data.description: Built with WordPress. This is my personal blog that discusses daily activities such as holidays, taking care of administration, photo galleries, and several other topics.

data.title: BukaPotensi
data.description: Website for Bukalapak talent team to show their programs. Built with WordPress, and use custom Gutenberg Blocks.

data.title: Bukalapak Company Profile
data.description: Colaborate with Designer and Front-end Engineer to built a company profile website for Bukalapak.

data.title: Admin Dashboard for Bukalapak Insight
data.description: Online repository platform employed by the UX research team for the purpose of aggregating research findings. Built with NuxtJS and powered by the real-time capabilities of the Firebase database.

data.title: Marketplace Page
data.description: Utilizes the Wix Database to create interactive store pages that contain data from several marketplaces in Indonesia. Additionally, users can search for products and filter them by rating and price.

data.title: Weton Calculation Tools
data.description: Matchmaking prediction tool based on Weton calculations from the Javanese calendar, designed with the goal of enhancing user engagement. Developed within the Wix environment and powered by the Velo platform.
